_meanings:
{@--1@} (As a prefix to
verbs) over, above; ({#aDikAra#}); {#°sTA#} to
stand over; {#°kf#} to place over or at the
head of; {#°ruh#} to grow over or above;
over and above, besides, in addition
({#ADikya#}); fully, completely ({#atiSaya#}, 
{#viSeza#}), to get something in addition to
another; {#aDigatyajagatyaDISvarAt#} having
obtained fully, {#aDi#} intensifying the
meaning of the root; {#ito vA sAtimImahe#}
{#divo vA pArTivAdaDi#} <ls>Rv. 1. 6. 10</ls>; ({#aDImahe#}
{#ADikyena yAcAmahe#}).

{@--2@} (As a separable 
adverb) Over, above, from above 
(mostly Vedic); {#zazwirvIrAso aDi zaw#}  
<ls>Rv. 7. 18. 14.</ls>

{@--4@} (As first member of Tatpuruṣa
compounds) ({%a%}) Cheif, supreme,
principal, presiding; {#°devatA#} 
presiding deity; {#°rAjaH#} supreme or 
sovereign ruler; {#°patiH#} supreme lord
&c. ({%b%}) Redundant, superfluous
(growing over another); {#°daMtaH#} = 
{#aDyArUQaH#} ({#daMtasyopari jAtaH#}) {#daMtaH#}  
<ls>P. VI. 2. 188</ls>. ({%c%}) Over, excessive;  
{#°aDikzepaH#} high censure. According to G.
<ls>M.</ls> {#aDi#} has these senses:  
{#aDiraDyayanESvaryavaSitvasmaraRADike .#} {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%}; {#upADyAyAdaDIte#}; 
{#iNo'DyayanArTakatvasya aDidyotakaH; aDipatiH#} ( 
{#ESvarye#}); {#aDInaH#} ({#vaSitve#}) {#aDigataH inaM#}; 
{#mAturaDyeti#} ({#smaraRe#}); {#aDikaM#} ({#aDike#}). In the
Veda {#aDi#} is supposed by <ls>B. and R.</ls> to
have the senses of ‘out of’, ‘from,’
‘of,’ ‘among,’ ‘before’, ‘beforehand’,
‘for’, ‘in favour of’, ‘in’ ‘at’.
